name: 宋國明
objective:
本課程希望協助學生瞭解如何以標準積體電路系統設計流程來設計超大型積體電路系統，旨在採用多種數位與類比電腦輔助設計軟體來訓練學生，使其能熟悉並使用超大型積體電路系統的設計軟體，培育學生具備超大型積體電路系統設計實務與經驗。本課程的主要內容包括：1.超大型積體電路簡介；2.晶片製程介紹；3.MOSFET元件；4. MOSFET走線；5.Hspice軟體介紹 ；6. Hspice電路模擬；7.類比電路佈局與實作；8.Verilog HDL(硬體描述語言)；9.電路合成 ；10.自動測試圖樣產生；11.時脈靜態分析；12.電路佈局與佈線；13.DRC與LVS檢測；14.寄生參數萃取與佈局後模擬；15.設計功能驗證16. 設計方案報告
Students will learn how to design VLSI circuits and systems based on a standard VLSI system design flow, where various electronic design automation (EDA) tools will be used extensively in the semester. Those EDA tools includes analog and digital circuits and systems. The main purpose of this course includes the following:
1.　　VLSI Introduction.
2.　　Manufacturing Process.
3.　　MOSFET Devices.
4.　　MOSFET Wires.
5.　　Hspice Software.
6.　　Hspice Simulation.
7.　　Analog IC Layout and Practice.
8.　　Verilog-HDL.
9.　　Synthesis.
10.　　Design for Testability and Automatic Test Pattern Generation.
11.　　Static Timing Analysis.
12.　　Placement and Routing.
13.　　Design Rule Check, Layout Versus Schematic.
14.　　Layout Parasitic Extraction and Simulation.
15.　　Design Verification.
16.　　Project Presentation.
schedule:
Week 1 VLSI Introduction.
Week 2 Manufacturing Process.
Week 3 MOSFET Devices.
Week 4 MOSFET Wires.
Week 5 Hspice Software.
Week 6 Hspice Simulation.
Week 7 Hspice Examples
Week 8 Analog IC Layout and Practice.
Week 9 Verilog-HDL.
Week 10 Synthesis.
Week 11 Design for Testability and Automatic Test Pattern Generation.
Week 12 Static Timing Analysis.
Week 13 Placement and Routing.
Week 14 Design Rule Check, Layout Versus Schematic.
Week 15 Layout Parasitic Extraction and Simulation.
Week 16 Smith Chart Simulation
Week 17 ADS Software
Week 18 ADS Examples
scorePolicy:
(1). General Performance 20%.
(2). Homework  50%.
(3). Final Exam. 30% (Open book).
